attributes.action: to consider that St.George's Day is celebrated by a public holiday.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is felt that too often, St. George's Day passes us by and is not celebrated by the English Nation. It is about time this was put right.
The day should not have to be worked.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
